parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to which you want to assign a public IP address.

parameters.name: IpAddress
parameters.description: The public IP address. If you leave this parameter empty, the system randomly assigns a public IP address to the instance.

parameters.name: VlanId
parameters.description:
The virtual LAN (VLAN) ID of the instance.

> This parameter will be removed in the future. To ensure future compatibility, we recommend that you use other parameters.
